entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bancroft
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:09 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bancroft 2:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Temperature: -1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -5.4°C
Wind: S 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
